name: MOS ACP Championship VR Tour
description:
Capstone project is a final project to be worked on group for 4 weeks, to give experience participants working on real-world projects from clients and hone collaboration, communication, and participant problem-solving skills. This is one of the program for Independent Study with MyEduSolve that I have participated. I had the opportunity to a part of Team 1 to work on a project from MyEduSolve. The project brief is to make MOS-ACP virtual tour that contains information for the competition.

The members and roles of Team 1 for MES X Capstone are :
1. Aldi Riza Rahmawan - 3D & Technical Artist (Team Leader)
2. Ahmad Shahal Mahfudz - Game Programmer
3. Anbar Bahira - Game Designer
4. Bryan Eric Kurniawan - Game Programmer
5. Bramastya Pangestu Putra - 3D Artist

As game programmer I have responsible for : 

  • Creating game mechanic dan interaction
  • Testing build, evaluating, and bugs fixing in game
  • Optimizing the performance of the game
  • Creating robust dan maintainable code using C#
  • Design and creating Interactable UI for the Quiz minigame in Unity

This project is titled "MOS ACP Championship VR Tour". MOS ACP Championship VR Tour is a Virtual Reality Tour that introduces an overview of the MOS-ACP National Championship which is held annually by MyEduSolve. In the MOS ACP Championship VR Tour, players can visit 3 booths containing information about the competition. Booth 1 focuses on Introduction to MyEduSolve, Booth 2 on the Track Record and Information for the 2023 MOS ACP National Championship and Certification Links, and Booth 3 on the MOS ACP World Championship and Registration Link for the 2023 MOS ACP National Championship.

At each booth player will be given material in the form of posters, videos or sound. Each booth is also given a Quiz which is used to open the teleport area to the next booth. Teleport Area is an area used for players to move from one position to another (Movement).

MOS ACP Championship VR Tour was created to provide an overview to players regarding the implementation of the MOS ACP Championship through events or exhibitions with Virtual Reality. So that players can feel they are exploring the event directly and are interested in registering.

The minimum android device specification requirements are :

OS : Android 7.0 Nougat (API level 24)

CPU : Mediatek Helio P70

GPU : Mali-G72 MP3

RAM : 4 GB

Free Storage : 200 MB

Link GitHub : https://github.com/ahmdshahal/CapstoneProject
